attributes.action: stop making cut backs on Disability Benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As a personal case, this is a more apropriate matter for direct communication with the Department for Work and Pensions.  You can find contact details on their website at: http://www.dwp.gov.uk/contact/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
